hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Epona's Song#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #4# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Hylian Shield# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #in a meadow# Sheik teaches #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #2 Deku Scrubs#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #the Spooky Mask#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #the Gerudo Mask#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found in #Goron City#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Mask of Truth# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Bombchu Shop#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a solitary #Cow#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Farore's Wind#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the final item you're looking for can be found somewhere in Hyrule.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Bottom

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Epona's Song#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: I once glued a set of false teeth to the Boomerang.^${12 39 c7}That came back to bite me.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of time.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Sun's Song#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Sun's Song#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
